title: summon
author: 840196733mw
txt_content:
summon一把钻石剑，名字叫做 逗你玩 ，锋利 - 4


要summon，不要give

replies.author: 乙烯_中国
replies.txt_content: summon Item ~ ~ ~ {Item:{id:"diamond_sword",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"逗你玩",Lore:["这是要加的话","这是转行"]},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:0.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack}]}}}

replies.author: Angel_741
replies.txt_content: summon只能召唤实体，你确定钻石剑是实体？

replies.author: 叫俺欧巴
replies.txt_content: 楼主要的可是掉落在地上的钻石剑？

replies.author: 乙烯_中国
replies.txt_content: summon Item ~ ~ ~ {Item:{id:"diamond_sword",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"逗你玩"},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:0.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack}]}}}附魔游戏里不能调负的，所以这条指令直接设置了一把没有伤害加成的剑，和手打一样的伤害，想要更改伤害把里面那个0?0改成相应数字就好。

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
summon Item ~ ~ ~ {Item:{id:"diamond_sword",Count:1}}
等下 锋利是-4？

replies.author: 840196733mw
replies.txt_content:
叫俺欧巴 发表于 2015-6-24 14:56
楼主要的可是掉落在地上的钻石剑？
是的，忘记说清楚了，是以实体存在的钻石剑

replies.author: 840196733mw
replies.txt_content:
Jia_Yu 发表于 2015-6-24 20:07
summon
是照怪指令
无力吐槽，summon是刷实体好不好，summon又不是只能刷僵尸，小白，还可以刷物品和盔甲架，矿车，船，还有很多乱七八糟的东西
